properties.Descriptio: This was the invasion of Poland, the start of WWII.  The invasion began in Danzig.  This is the introduction of the Blitzkrieg (lightening war).
properties.Name: Invasion of Poland

properties.Descriptio: The siege of Leningrad begins in September.  It lasted 872 days, making it the longest siege in history.
properties.Name: Siege of Leningrad

properties.Descriptio: Codename 'Operation Typhoon', this was the Nazi invasion of Mosocow. Lasted until January 2, 1942
properties.Name: Siege of Leningrad

properties.Descriptio: Invasion of the city of Stalingrad.  This was the turning point of the war.
properties.Name: Battle of Stalingrad

properties.Descriptio: Liberation of the city of Smolensk.
properties.Name: Battle of Smolensk

properties.Descriptio: Continued Soviet Operations in liberating the Ukraine.
properties.Name: Battle of Kiev

properties.Descriptio: Invasion of East Germany by the Soviet Union.
properties.Name: Vistulaâ€“Oder Offensive

properties.Descriptio: One of the final battles of the Eastern front.  Soviet forces faced heavy casualties.
properties.Name: Battle of Seelow Heights

properties.Descriptio: Final battle of the Eastern Front.  Hitler and other major German leaders commit suicide.
properties.Name: Battle of Berlin
